segments.advisor_message: So, let's start with your retirement dreams. What age are you hoping to retire at?
segments.client_message: Um, well, I guess I’ve been thinkin’ about it a lot, and I’d really like to retire, uh, maybe around 65 or so? But, you know, it kinda depends on... how things go with my job and stuff, right?

segments.advisor_message: That makes sense. And what about your current employment status?
segments.client_message: Oh! Right, so, currently, I’m, like, working full-time at, uh, this tech company, you know? But I mean, I’ve been thinking what if I could just, like, do something part-time or maybe even freelance after retiring? It just feels like—ugh, I just want a bit more, you know, freedom?
